price: (Farao) yε maa ne nkorͻfoͻ no faa (asεm kεseε) no agodisεm, enti wͻyεε sotie maa no. Nokorε sε na wͻyε nkorͻfoͻ a wͻyε nsεmͻnedifoͻ paa.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭāʿūhu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
